website_summaries.verdict: KEEN has a respectable collection of casual shoes due to its consistency with quality and durability. With the KEEN Glenhaven Sneaker, wearers can expect these attributes and more.Comfort, light, and supportive, the low-top could be used for a variety of casual happenings and semi-formal occasions. However, many wearers warned that it has shorter than average laces.
pros: There is a couple of commenters who have praised the quality of the footwear’s construction
Comfort is among the highlights of the KEEN men's Glenhaven sneaker, according to a lot of customers
A user found the footwear’s support as sufficient for casual strolls around the city
The majority of shoppers like the sophisticated style of the low-top
Loyal KEEN customers mention that the Glenhaven Sneaker did not disappoint regarding its overall features
Several buyers have shared that there is no need for sizing adjustment as the shoe is true to size
A commenter is pleased about the shoe’s silhouette as it blends naturally with denim jeans
Durability has been impressive, as per many purchasers
cons: A convincing number of wearers complain that the KEEN Glenhaven Sneaker’s laces are shorter than average
It could take a few uses before it fully breaks in, according to other reviews

customer_reviews.title: Not Good for Wide Feet
customer_reviews.text: Just got this shoe and have been a dedicated Keen fan for years now. It' a great looking shoe but if you have wide feet, you need to pass on this. I was thinking they may open up but I think I will end up returning. They are really stiff.
customer_reviews.author: S. Tobin

customer_reviews.title: Great Looking Shoe, But Fits A Little Snug
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is great looking and comfortable with ample arch support. However, like some other reviewers have stated, they do run on the narrow end. I'm a slim person with normal to narrow feet, and these shoes in my regular size fit a little snug. Length-wise they are perfect, just run a little narrow. Other than that, great shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Hallucinating Elvis

customer_reviews.title: Nice, High Quality Shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Was pleasantly surprised with the quality. I hate buying shoes online, but these are hard to find in the store. I usually get burned on the sizing when I buy online. The shoes are solidly made and fit absolutely true to size. The only minor issue is that the laces are too short. Since the uppers are solid leather, I did coat the top with a spray that helps to waterproof. Nice shoe and I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Alan Gunderson

customer_reviews.title: Ended a long search but what's with the laces?
customer_reviews.text: The end of Patagonia making shoes sent me on a long hunt for anything that offered similar comfort, durability, relatively conservative looks, at a reasonable price. These shoes finally delivered. I had tried similar Keen shoes in the past but they were mostly fabric and not as heavy or durable. These all-leather uppers gave me the feel I wanted while still looking sleek and narrow. But the laces are a bit of a nightmare and I haven't quite figured out what to do about them. They are such a thick gauge and so short that I can't get them to stay tied, I literally tie them 5-6 times a day. Will need to replace them....
customer_reviews.author: GustyGardener

customer_reviews.title: Great Sneakers!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these shoes, so much I bought 2 pair. The materials are high quality and the construction is well made. Fit my feet great, padded sole is very comfortable. A little dressier than regular sneakers so perfect for casual Friday’s with jeans.
customer_reviews.author: HiHoSteveO

customer_reviews.title: What happened to the fit??
customer_reviews.text: I've bought several Keen's and fit has always been perfect. These look really nice, but fit was too short and narrow.
customer_reviews.author: DEAN C WATCHORN NEWBREY

customer_reviews.title: Very happy!
customer_reviews.text: Still enjoying these shoes. Used them for long urban walks all summer. Stylish, comfortable, and a great value. Hope they will last.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice shoes but one of them had a flaw.
customer_reviews.text: A very nice looking and comfortable shoe. Not deserving of five stars, however, because the tongue on one of the shoes was about a quarter inch too long and it dig into my ankle until the leather eventually broke in, which took numerous wearings to do.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Truthteller

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Second pair of these shoes and they come just as described on the website. No problems or concerns.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Toe box is a bit cramped, nice style
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit well except for the toe box. If you have wide feet or bunions/hammertoes etc., I would reconsider.
customer_reviews.author: L.

customer_reviews.title: Too small for my own good!!
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is way too small...in length and in width. I stopped wearing the shoe after the first day. Keen never use to be that way. Now whether it is the supplier or Keen’s decision the shoe is cut too small. I won’t buy Keen again.
customer_reviews.author: peter c arena

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are really comfortable. The only complaint I have is that the laces are a little short and difficult to tie.
customer_reviews.author: Afton Esson

customer_reviews.title: Love Keen!
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for my husband who is hard to fit and he loves them!
customer_reviews.author: W

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Wear these to work and everywhere else. Comfortable shoe that fits well.
customer_reviews.author: amazonshannon

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe...!
customer_reviews.text: Leather is stiff for the first couple times you wear them, mostly because they are made very well.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Mills

customer_reviews.title: Narrower fit than any Keen shoes I’ve had before
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable and durable. I’ve worn these shoes 10-12 hours a day to work for a couple months now and they are the most comfortable work shoes I’ve owned. The fit is narrower than most Keens but that is better for me personally
customer_reviews.author: Justin M.

customer_reviews.title: Great fashion sneaker. Keen does it again.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable for a fashion sneaker. Love the style and very happy with the color.
customer_reviews.author: jim prinzing

customer_reviews.title: Keen Glenhaven
customer_reviews.text: Fit as expected. Wish laces were about 2 inches longer , but fit fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Made in the USA!
customer_reviews.text: Cant beat keen's. Made in the USA! And a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: Great Keen shoe. Fits like all of my other Keens.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: Looks good and feels good. Good fit. Very nice casual shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan K. Groh

customer_reviews.title: Too narrow
customer_reviews.text: I’v had good luck with Keen’s but these were too narrow.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Fits Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: There is a lot of arch support and they feel very sturdy and the fabric is amazing. I wear size 11.5 and they fit true to that size.
customer_reviews.author: Jake O.

customer_reviews.title: horrible shoe
customer_reviews.text: i have been wearing Keen shoes almost exclusively now for over 10 years. They always fit great and wear great. Not this shoe. It may be the most uncomfortable shoe i have ever had on my feet. Not the great roomy toe box associated with Keen. it is stiff as metal . i had to take them off at work after only two hours and put on steel toed boots to be comfortable !! I am sure if i had left them on i would have had 'lotus feet' by the day's end. Pass on this Keen shoe.
customer_reviews.author: jmbinid

customer_reviews.title: Mens Keen Glenhaven Sneaker Black
customer_reviews.text: Cool concept and really nice build looked good in the box too. I love the picture on Amazon but the fit is for a little girls foot! Squeezed my foot like a vise, painful to wear for even thirty seconds. No way I even try to walk in the one I tried on.
customer_reviews.author: critter number one

product_meta.title: KEEN Men's Glenhaven Sneaker, Black, 11 M US
